DOC.brief_summary: The current study retrospectively assesses laryngeal mask airway use during pediatric adenoidectomies in terms of patient safety, comfort, complications and surgeon satisfaction levels.
DOC.criteria: 116 years of age ASA III Scheduled for elective adenoidectomy under general anesthesia with FLMA between June 2012 and November 2015. Emergency Extreme obesity Sign of clinical significant infection.
